edu.gvsu.kurmasz.zawilinski

Class MediaWikiLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gvsu.kurmasz.zawilinski.MediaWikiLoader

  • public class MediaWikiLoader
extends Object

    Generate the DOM for a MediaWiki XML document. In particular, this class uses JAXB to unmarshall an XML stream into Java objects. This class is written specifically to support MediaWiki XML documents only because it expects the root of the DOM to be a MediaWikiType object.

    Debug levels used:

    • PARSE_BEGIN_END: Announce beginning and end of parsing
    Author:
    Zachary Kurmas

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MediaWikiLoader.XMLConfigurationException
      Exception describing a problem with the XML software setup.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONTEXT_PATH
      Name of package containing schema-derived classes (i.e., the classes that correspond to each element in the MediaWiki schema).

      • createUnmarshaller

        public static Unmarshaller createUnmarshaller()
        Create a JAXB Unmarshaller for documents using the current MediaWiki schema.
        Returns:
        a JAXB Unmarshaller for documents using the current MediaWiki schema.
        Throws:
        MediaWikiLoader.XMLConfigurationException - if there is a problem creating the JAXB context

      • load

        public static JAXBElement<MediaWikiType> load(Source source,
                                              edu.gvsu.kurmasz.warszawa.log.SimpleLog log,
                                              Unmarshaller unmarshaller)
                                       throws JAXBException
        Loads the entire XML document and returns a JAXBElement<MediaWikiType> object representing the root.
        Parameters:
        source - the source of the XML data
        log - a Log to which to report progress
        unmarshaller - the JAXB Unmarshaller
        Returns:
        a JAXBElement<MediaWikiType> object representing the root of the loaded XML document.
        Throws:
        JAXBException - if there is a problem generating the DOM
        IllegalArgumentException - if any parameters are null
